title: I know that short "C" from somewhere
content:
I know i've seen it before, but I can't find out the name of this font. I tried WhatTheFont already.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317210644im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ascenu_5805.png)

Font: 

 Soolidium

comments.content:
Soolidium by Soolid. Designer Alberto Alberti.
